name: Tumbler 3pcs bottle set with straw
description:
1. Introducing our premium Tumbler 3-Piece Bottle Set with Straw, designed for those who appreciate both functionality and style in their beverage containers. Each tumbler in this set is crafted from high-quality, BPA-free plastic, ensuring that your drinks remain safe and free from harmful chemicals. The sleek design features a double-wall construction that not only keeps your beverages at the desired temperature for longer periods but also prevents condensation from forming on the exterior, keeping your hands and surfaces dry. With a generous capacity, these tumblers are perfect for a variety of drinks, including iced coffee, smoothies, and refreshing water infusions.

2. The Tumbler 3-Piece Bottle Set comes equipped with reusable straws, promoting an eco-friendly lifestyle while enhancing your drinking experience. Each straw is made from durable, food-grade silicone, providing a soft yet sturdy option for sipping your favorite beverages. The set includes three vibrant colors, allowing you to easily identify your tumbler at gatherings or family outings. The straws are also designed to fit snugly into the tumblers, ensuring that you can enjoy your drinks without any spills or leaks. Additionally, the tumblers feature a secure, screw-on lid that prevents accidental openings, making them ideal for travel or outdoor activities.

3. This versatile tumbler set is not only practical but also aesthetically pleasing, making it a perfect addition to your kitchen or a thoughtful gift for friends and family. The lightweight design allows for easy portability, whether you are heading to the gym, office, or a picnic in the park. Cleaning is a breeze, as the tumblers and straws are dishwasher safe, ensuring that you can maintain their pristine condition with minimal effort. Elevate your hydration game with our Tumbler 3-Piece Bottle Set with Straw, where convenience meets style, making every sip a delightful experience.

description:

Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, this double-wall insulated bottle maintains your drink?s temperature for hours, whether you?re sipping hot coffee on a chilly morning or enjoying a cold beverage under the sun.

name: Pack of 2 Hand griper - Gym equipment - hand gripper for building veins
description:
Build stronger hands, wrists, and forearms with this high-quality **Adjustable Hand Gripper**. Designed for athletes, fitness lovers, and anyone looking to improve grip strength, this tool is perfect for daily workouts or rehabilitation exercises.



? **Durable & Non-Slip Design** ? Made with premium ABS plastic and stainless steel spring for long-lasting use.

? **Adjustable Resistance** ? Easily adjust from **10kg to 40kg (22lbs ? 88lbs)** to match your fitness level.

? **Comfortable Grip** ? Ergonomic, anti-slip handles ensure comfort during extended use.

? **Compact & Portable** ? Lightweight design makes it easy to carry anywhere, whether at home, office, or gym.

? **Multi-Purpose Training** ? Ideal for improving grip, finger strength, forearm muscles, and aiding recovery from injuries.



**Perfect For:**

? Gym enthusiasts

? Sports players (cricket, tennis, badminton, etc.)

? Musicians (guitarists, pianists)

? Office workers with long computer use

? Physiotherapy & rehab exercises

1 x Adjustable Hand Gripper

description:

Winter Leg Warmers Sleeves is a luxurious and soft wool obtained from cashmere goats. It is known for its warmth and comfort.The use of cashmere wool suggests that the leg warmers are designed to provide insulation, trapping and retaining body heat to keep you warm in cold conditions.Winter Leg Warmers Sleeves is known for its soft and luxurious feel, providing comfort against the skin.
Winter Leg Warmers Sleeves. Crafted for exceptional warmth and comfort, these leg warmers are designed to keep you cozy in the coldest of temperatures.
